doc:
Chester Conklin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chester_Conklin 0 Chester Cooper Conklin (January 11, 1886 – October 11, 1971) was an early American film comedian who started at Keystone Studios as one of Mack Sennett’s Keystone Cops, often paired with Mack Swain. He appeared in a series of films with Mabel Normand and worked closely with Charlie Chaplin, both in silent and sound films. Chester_Cooper_Conklin ( January_11_,_1886 – October_11_,_1971 ) was an_early_American_film_comedian who started at Keystone_Studios as one of Mack_Sennett ’s_Keystone_Cops , often paired with Mack_Swain . He appeared in a_series of films with Mabel_Normand and worked closely with Charlie_Chaplin , both in silent_and_sound_films .
